title: IBM Cloud Virtual FortiGate Security Appliance
introduction: IBM Cloud Virtual FortiGate Security Appliance allows you to route private and public network traffic selectively, through a full-featured, enterprise-level firewall powered by FortiOS software and FortiGuard AI-powered Security Services.

section_highlights.title: What is computer networking?
section_highlights.description: Computer networking is the process of connecting computing devices to enable the transmission and exchange of information and resources.
